entities.description: Federally-recognized American Indian reservations (AIRs) and off-reservation trust land areas.
State-recognized American Indian Reservations (SAIRs) established by some State governments for tribes.
Oklahoma tribal statistical areas (OTSAs) representing former American Indian reservations in Oklahoma.
Tribal designated statistical areas (TDSAs) intended to encompass a compact area with individuals identifying with delineated federally-recognized tribes.
State designated tribal statistical areas (SDTSAs) for State-recognized tribes that do not have recognized reservations.
Variable indicating whether a census block was identified as an American Indian area.

relationships.description: American Indian areas consist of federally-recognized American Indian reservations and off-reservation trust land areas.
American Indian areas consist of state-recognized American Indian reservations.
American Indian areas consist of Oklahoma tribal statistical areas representing former reservations.
American Indian areas consist of tribal designated statistical areas for federally-recognized tribes.
American Indian areas consist of state designated tribal statistical areas for state-recognized tribes.
Indicates whether a census block is in an American Indian area.
